text.title: UN publishes report on 2014 Gaza conflict
text.head: UN publishes report on 2014 Gaza conflict
Sources

list.item: "Gaza: Security Council receives report of inquiry into incidents during 2014 conflict" — UN News Center , April 27, 2015
